summary: The customer was looking for information about Contoso Wireless' streaming services. The agent provided information about the three different packages available (Basic, Standard, and Premium), as well as the discounts offered and any additional benefits such as access to Contoso On Demand and Contoso Music. The agent also mentioned that there are free trials and promotional codes available, as well as 24/7 customer service support. Finally, the agent gave instructions on how to sign up for the streaming service.
